@@ -90,10 +90,0 @@
-// This class wraps a node and a pointer type.
-class C2AccessValuePtr: public C2AccessValue {
-
-public:
-  C2AccessValuePtr(Node* node, const TypePtr* type) :
-    C2AccessValue(node, type) {}
-
-  const TypePtr* type() const { return _type->is_ptr(); }
-};
